Usually, to describe the components of tasks, there are such characteristic features as descriptive, physical, functional, social, price and environmental.
The usual descriptive (physical) characteristics are: content, structure, color, shape, texture, sound, taste, smell, size and density.
The usual functional characteristic features are: marketing, production, sale, role, duration.
Ordinary social characteristics are: responsibilities, social policies, as well as related to the legality and morality of restrictions.
The usual price characteristics are: cost, wholesale and small prices, consumer prices.
Ordinary environmental characteristics are: positive or negative environmental impact.
For example, the characteristic features of the pencil can be: used for writing, yellow, simple, with an elastic band, sharp, hexagonal, has an inscription on the surface, cylindrical.

Characteristic features of a commercial agreement may be: payment amount, payment time, form of agreement, security of financing, responsibility of the parties, corporate policy, coverage in the press, time of completion of the agreement and the attitude of the company employees.
